attributes.action: Explain to the public what exactly is happening with all exams in 2021.
attributes.additional_details: Everyday we wake up and stare at a screen for approximately 6 hours with no idea of what we are working towards. It is very stressful, demotivating and bad for our mental health so please consider telling us exactly what is going on regarding our exams as it would put every single students mind at rest.
attributes.background: We were told in early January that the 2021 exams in the summer were not going a head as normal but we are nearly in March with no word on what is exactly happening with our A-levels and GCSE’s. It is important that we know because it will relieve us of a lot of stress.

rejection.details:
On 25th February the Government gave further details of how qualifications including A-levels and GCSEs will be awarded in 2021. For more information see:
https://www.gov.uk/government/speeches/how-qualifications-will-be-awarded-in-2021
https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/awarding-qualifications-in-summer-2021/awarding-qualifications-in-summer-2021
